attributes.action: WORK PROGRAMMES ARE A WASTE OF SPACE
attributes.additional_details: I have been on the work programme Seetec and I had no support at all whatsover and they never helped me to get a job and when I did finally got one that was 5 days a week part time 8 hours they still wasn't happy and once they had told me to pack my paid job in just to go on their courses or reviews. I had to do everything myself and once they gave me permission to go on holiday to Paris and that they change it for another day. Until my money got stopped by the Job Centre. Also they never get the date right.
